00579 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00580 
00581 inline Granularity GeometryHelper::GetHitTypeGranularity(const HitType hitType)
00582 {
00583     HitTypeToGranularityMap::const_iterator iter = m_hitTypeToGranularityMap.find(hitType);
00584 
00585     if (m_hitTypeToGranularityMap.end() != iter)
00586         return iter->second;
00587 
00588     throw StatusCodeException(STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND);
00589 }
00590
